details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.1.3 File trailer - Info key
details.description: The Info key shall not be present in the trailer dictionary of PDF/A-4 conforming files unless there exists a PieceInfo entry in the document catalog dictionary.

rule.description: The Info key shall not be present in the trailer dictionary of PDF/A-4 conforming files unless there exists a PieceInfo entry in the document catalog dictionary.
